modName: Deja Vu - I Already Read It
summary: Flag books as \"Already Read\" when you read them!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/upload/sagittarius22/sagittarius22_1330707422_Moorelf_1328629167_logo_sagittarius3.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/images/972816-1340052449.png[/img]

[center][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]============================ ENGLISH ============================[/b][/color][/center]

[b]Version:[/b] 1.1
[b]Author:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=972816]Sagittarius22[/url]
[b]Category:[/b] Gameplay/Interface
[b]Requirement:[/b] [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender[/url]
[b]Description:[/b] Whenever you open a new book, it will be flagged as \"Already Read\".

This mod is bilingual; by default it\'s in English.

To ttranslate it in French, open the console and type: 
set SAGAlreadyReadBooksGlobalLanguage to 1 (FRENCH)
set SAGAlreadyReadBooksGlobalLanguage to 0 (ENGLISH)

or use the optional TXT files and put them in your Skyrim folder, where TESV.exe is, and type:
BAT BookEnglish or BAT BookFrench
[b]Install[/b]: Put the files included in the DATA folder, in your Skyrim\\DATA folder and check this md with your favorite mod manager!

[center][color=\"#FF0000\"][b]============================ FRENCH ============================[/b][/color][/center]

[b]Version :[/b] 1.1
[b]Auteur :[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=972816]Sagittarius22[/url]

[b]Prérequis :[/b] [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender[/url]
[b]Description : [/b] 
[b]Installation:[/b]
